Sentence.sentence: The Russian, Greek and Polish storks flew as far as South Africa, while those from Spain, Tunisia and Germany flew only as far as the Sahel.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Landfill sites on the Iberian Peninsula have long attracted local white storks, but all of the Spanish birds tagged in the study flew across the Sahara Desert to the western Sahel.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Instead of flying thousands of miles in search of food, they make the waste sites their winter feeding grounds.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Andrea Flack of the Max Planck Institute found that birds following traditional migration routes were more likely to die than German storks that flew only as far as northern Morocco, and spent the winter there on rubbish dumps.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We break our promise not to fly after hearing about a neighbour's trip to India.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That means that the FAA could suspend Virgin Galactic's licence to fly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Cyrano was dead and buried for a good three centuries before the first manned rockets started to fly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: About a year ago, I flew to Singapore to join the writer Malcolm Gladwell, the fashion designer Marc Ecko and the graphic designer Stefan Sagmeister in addressing a group of advertising people on "Marketing to the Child of Tomorrow".
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They brighten in parks and gardens as they fly among the flowers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And then they fly to go across Mexico into Texas
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: So when fly the north, they might lay eggs in Louisiana and die.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They have strong wings capable of flying long distances.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A 23-year-old girl with an incurable disease can fly to Alaska and everything can work out.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But that won't stop inventors from dreaming up new ways to fly and trying to persuade investors to back their sometimes outrageous schemes.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Several companies around the world have produced prototypes that can drive on roads and fly, airbus has a futuristic modular concept involving a passenger capsule that can be detached from the road- going chassis and picked up by a helicopter-type machine
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

means: Flying Tiger Line 飞虎群英队

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动物或短语动词都有"逃跑，逃脱"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: escape, flee, fly, get away, run away
means: escape ： 侧重逃跑的结果，不强调逃跑时的匆忙或危险情况。
flee ： 书面用词，侧重指逃跑时动作匆忙，多含惧怕之意。
fly含义与flee相同，但系非正式用词。
get away ： 口语用语。侧重指犯罪分子从现场逃跑或被捕时逃走。
run away ： 口语用语，强调动作迅速。

list.explanation: 遵守规矩，有道德，循规蹈矩，为人正常, 诚实可靠

example.en: You must fly right when you get to the party.
example.zh: 你们去参加宴会时，一定要有规矩，要讲礼貌。

example.en: He's my son.I want him to fly right.
example.zh: 他是我儿子。我希望他做人能正直。

lj.lj_ly: I knew there were no flies on her, but I wondered how she had found out.

entry.def: A fly is a small insect with two wings. There are many kinds of flies, and the most common are black in colour.
When something such as a bird, insect, or aircraft flies, it moves through the air.

example.ex: The planes flew through the clouds...
example.tran: 飞机穿越云层。

example.ex: The bird flew away.
example.tran: 鸟儿飞走了。

entry.def: If you fly somewhere, you travel there in an aircraft.

example.ex: He flew to Los Angeles...
example.tran: 他飞往洛杉矶。

example.ex: He flew back to London...
example.tran: 他飞回了伦敦。

entry.def: When someone flies an aircraft, they control its movement in the air.

example.ex: Parker had successfully flown both aircraft...
example.tran: 两架飞机帕克均成功驾驶过。

example.ex: He flew a small plane to Cuba...
example.tran: 他驾驶一架小型飞机飞往古巴。

entry.def: To fly someone or something somewhere means to take or send them there in an aircraft.

example.ex: It may be possible to fly the women and children out on Thursday...
example.tran: 周四可能会将妇女和儿童空运出去。

example.ex: The relief supplies are being flown from a warehouse in Pisa.
example.tran: 救济物资正从比萨的一个仓库空运过来。

entry.def: If something such as your hair is flying about, it is moving about freely and loosely in the air.

example.ex: His long, uncovered hair flew back in the wind...
example.tran: 他那露在外面的长发随风向后飞舞。

example.ex: She was running down the stairs, her hair flying.
example.tran: 她从楼上跑下来，长发飘动着。

entry.def: If you fly a flag or if it is flying, you display it at the top of a pole.

example.ex: They flew the flag of the African National Congress...
example.tran: 他们升起非洲人国民大会的旗帜。

example.ex: A flag was flying on the new military HQ.
example.tran: 一面旗帜在新的军事指挥部上空飘扬着。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something flies in a particular direction, you are emphasizing that they move there with a lot of speed or force.

example.ex: She flew to their bedsides when they were ill...
example.tran: 在他们生病的时候她飞奔至他们身边。

example.ex: I flew downstairs...
example.tran: 我飞奔到楼下。

entry.def: If you tell someone that you must fly, you are indicating that you have to leave in a great hurry.

example.ex: I must fly or I'll miss my plane...
example.tran: 我必须赶快走了否则就会误机。

example.ex: I'll have to fly.
example.tran: 我得赶紧走了。

entry.def: If stories or rumours are flying around a place, they are being discussed a great deal and by a lot of people within a short period of time.

example.ex: Rumours had been flying around the workrooms all morning...
example.tran: 整个早上流言在各工作间传来传去。

example.ex: Rumours were flying about possible deals.
example.tran: 关于可能的交易的传闻在满天飞。

entry.def: The front opening on a pair of trousers is referred to as the fly, or in British English the flies. It usually consists of a zip or row of buttons behind a band of cloth.
In fishing, a fly is a model of a small winged insect that is used as a bait.
If you say that someone wouldn't hurt a fly or wouldn't harm a fly, you are emphasizing that they are very kind and gentle.

example.ex: Ray wouldn't hurt a fly.
example.tran: 雷心肠很软。

example.ex: ...a lovely girl, who would not have harmed a fly.
example.tran: 连一只苍蝇都不肯伤害的可爱女孩

entry.def: If you let fly, you attack someone, either physically by hitting them, or with words by insulting them.

example.ex: A simmering row ended with her letting fly with a stream of obscenities.
example.tran: 激烈的争吵最后以她一连串的污言秽语而告结束。

entry.def: If you do something on the fly, you do it quickly without thinking about it or planning it in advance, especially while something else is happening.

example.ex: It was all pretty much done on the fly.
example.tran: 那几乎都是匆忙之中完成的。

entry.def: If you send someone or something flying or if they go flying, they move through the air and fall down with a lot of force.
entry.tran: (把…)打翻在地;(使)重重地摔在地上

example.ex: The blow sent the young man flying.
example.tran: 这一拳把那个年轻人打翻在地。

entry.def: If you say that you would like to be a fly on the wall in a situation that does not involve you, you mean that you would like to see or hear what happens in that situation.

example.ex: What I'd give to be a fly on the wall when Davis finds out what's happened to his precious cargo.
example.tran: 我多么希望能够看到戴维斯发现他珍贵的货物出事时的样子啊。

entry.def: If you fly at someone, you attack them, either physically by hitting them, or with words by insulting them.

example.ex: She flew at him for making a very anti-British remark.
example.tran: 她攻击他激烈的反英言论。

entry.def: If you fly into a bad temper or a panic, you suddenly become very angry or anxious and show this in your behaviour.
entry.tran: 突然爆发(坏脾气);突然陷入(恐慌)

example.ex: Losing a game would cause him to fly into a rage.
example.tran: 输掉一场比赛会让他暴跳如雷。

means.word_mean: 1. two-winged insects characterized by active flight
2. flap consisting of a piece of canvas that can be drawn back to provide entrance to a tent
3. an opening in a garment that is closed by a zipper or buttons concealed by a fold of cloth
4. (baseball) a hit that flies up in the air
5. fisherman's lure consisting of a fishhook decorated to look like an insect
1. travel through the air; be airborne;

sentences.sentence: "We fly flowers from the Caribbean to North America"

means.word_mean: 7. change quickly from one emotional state to another;
10. display in the air or cause to float;

sentences.sentence: "All nations fly their flags in front of the U.N."
"He threw down his gun and fled"

means.word_mean: 12. travel over (an area of land or sea) in an aircraft;

sentences.sentence: "Lindbergh was the first to fly the Atlantic"

means.word_mean: 1. (British informal) not to be deceived or hoodwinked

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English flēogan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vliegen and German fliegen, also to fly
Old English flȳge, flēoge, denoting any winged insect, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch vlieg and German Fliege, also to fly

means: 机灵的；机警的；不会上当的,时髦迷人的；漂亮的

sentences.cn: 蝙蝠是一种夜行性飞行哺乳动物. 这里目前的统计资料表明是一种较小, 食虫的蝙蝠.
sentences.en: Bats are nocturnal flying mammals. The statistics presented here describe small, insectivorous bats.

sentences.cn: 在高空中飞行的不只有鸟类.
sentences.en: Birds are not the only ones that fly high in the sky.

sentences.cn: 就像现代鼯鼠在空中那样飞行.
sentences.en: That is how modern flying squirrels travel through the air.

sentences.cn: 飞机飞行到了一个非常的高度.
sentences.en: The plane flew to a very high altitude.

sentences.cn: 在那时的358年前--1545年,已有飞行器在空中飞行了.
sentences.en: It flew 358 years earlier in 1545.

sentences.cn: 他坐着基路伯飞行, 在风的翅膀上显现.
sentences.en: He mounted the cherubim and flew; he soared on the wings of the wind.

sentences.cn: 我一想到飞行就吓得战战兢兢.
sentences.en: The thought of flying fills me with panic.

sentences.cn: 下一步便是制造依靠风力飞行的滑翔机.
sentences.en: Their next step was to build and experiment with gliders , aircraft that fly on wind currents.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 科学史

sentences.cn: 他设计了一种新式飞行器.
sentences.en: He contrived a new machine for flying.

sentences.cn: 而不是飞行入入口, 飞行北部往隧道的出口.
sentences.en: Instead of flying into the entrance, fly North towards the exit of the tunnel.

sentences.cn: 问: 请问捷蓝航空联运协议,机管局员工在更广泛的飞行?
sentences.en: Q: Will the JetBlue interline agreement result in more flying for AA employees?

sentences.cn: 雁排成了V形飞行.
sentences.en: The geese were flying in a V.

sentences.cn: 为什么平流层适合飞机飞行?
sentences.en: Why is stratosphere suitable for the plane to fly?

sentences.cn: 换上航空材料和航空发动机, 即能够飞行.
sentences.en: Exchanges the aviation material and the aircraft engine, namely can fly.

sentences.cn: 飞机正朝北飞行.
sentences.en: The aircraft was flying in a northerly direction.

sentences.cn: 他们的飞机是仿制1919英国的维美轰炸机.事实证明, 想让这架飞机顺利飞行可不容易.
sentences.en: Their Vimy, a replica a 1919 British bomber, would prove a handful to fly.

sentences.cn: 英国皇家飞行队和皇家海军航空部队合并,成立英国皇家空军.
sentences.en: Royal Air Force was formed, by the amalgamation Royal Flying Corps and Royal Naval Air Service.

sentences.cn: 飞行并不危险, 坠机才危险.
sentences.en: Flying isn't dangerous. Crashing is what's dangerous.

sentences.cn: 新的飞行坐骑, 工程学独有,有普通和史诗两种.
sentences.en: Flying Mount added for Engineers. Regular and Epic version.

sentences.cn: 他们创造了动力滑翔伞飞行高度新的世界纪录.
sentences.en: They set a new world record for the flying height of the powered paraglider.

sentences.cn: 航空公司的飞行员也曾经报告说看到过,甚至连在宇宙中飞行的宇航员都曾经见到过.
sentences.en: Airline pilots also have reported seeing astro - nauts ── the men who fly in spaceships.

sentences.cn: 道吉特: 飞行是对鸟和棒球来说的. 美国海军陆战队, 先生.
sentences.en: DOGGETT: Flying is for birds and baseballs. USMC, sir.

sentences.cn: 在儿童故事中, 女巫常常骑着她们的扫帚飞行.
sentences.en: In children's stories, witches are usually flying with their brooms.

sentences.cn: 我们乘着小船进入洞里, 有人在那里唱歌,歌声悠扬动听,飘荡在洞内的上方.
sentences.en: We entered in to a tunnel with a boat, where a melody was flying inside.

sentences.cn: 明天我要乘飞机去香港。
sentences.en: I'm flying to Hong Kong tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 这是你第一次乘飞机吗？
sentences.en: Is this the first time that you've flown?

sentences.cn: 上个月我叔叔乘飞机到广州去了.
sentences.en: My uncle flew to Guangzhou last month.

sentences.cn: 今天你可以乘飞机去阿布辛波古庙,或者从湖的对岸乘小船去.
sentences.en: Today you can either fly to Abu Simbel or take a boat from across the lake.

sentences.cn: 海伦宁愿乘火车而不愿乘飞机.
sentences.en: Helen prefers going train to flying.

sentences.cn: 我想乘飞机到北京,并且途中在悉尼停留.
sentences.en: I'm flying to Beijing and I plan to stop over in Sydney on the way.

sentences.cn: 他明天乘飞机去香港旅行.
sentences.en: He flies to Hong Kong next day.

sentences.cn: 乘飞机去巴黎要五十镑.
sentences.en: It will cost you ￡50 to fly to Paris.

sentences.cn: 我们准备乘飞机去,但我讨厌乘飞机.
sentences.en: We are going by air and I hate flying.

sentences.cn: 你能不能与其他队员一起乘飞机离开?
sentences.en: Can't you fly off with the rest of the team?

sentences.cn: 父亲乘飞机来医院看我.
sentences.en: My father flew out to see me in hospital.

sentences.cn: 昨天他乘飞机前往伦敦.
sentences.en: He flew to London yesterday.

sentences.cn: 她从纽约乘飞机到伦敦.
sentences.en: She flew from New York to London.

sentences.cn: 我知道, 让我们乘飞机去昆明看看那儿壮观的石林.
sentences.en: I know, let's fly to Kunming to see the spectacular stone forest there.

sentences.cn: 我从美国来, 但我刚从香港乘飞机来的.
sentences.en: I'm from the United States, but I just flew in from Hong Kong.
sentences.from: 轻松英语会话---联想2000词(下)

sentences.cn: 路易士白利奥是第一个乘飞机飞越英吉利海峡的人.
sentences.en: Louis Bleriot was the first man to fly the English Channel.

sentences.cn: 她不习惯乘飞机,一上飞机便有点紧张.
sentences.en: She's unused to flying and gets a little anxious in planes.

sentences.cn: 我们的代表团于6月1日乘飞机来到达桑给巴尔.
sentences.en: Our delegation flew to Zanzibar on June 1.

sentences.cn: 我今晚将乘飞机去广州.
sentences.en: I'm flying to Guangzhou tonight.

sentences.cn: 我乘飞机去, 我喜欢飞行.
sentences.en: I am going by air. I like flying.

sentences.cn: 他乘飞机回伦敦了.
sentences.en: He flew back to London.

sentences.cn: 他今天乘飞机来.
sentences.en: He flies in today.

sentences.cn: 享受了昆斯敦市的绝佳美景后再由基督城乘飞机回家.
sentences.en: Take in the breathtaking scenery around Queenstown before flying home from Christchurch.

sentences.cn: 明天我们参加试车的工程师就会乘飞机到达.
sentences.en: As our engineer for the trial run will fly in tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 我们将乘飞机回家,而不是坐火车.
sentences.en: We will fly back home instead of taking the train.

sentences.cn: 我的老板让我今天下午乘飞机去北京出差.
sentences.en: My boss wants me to fly to Beijing on business this afternoon.
sentences.from: 轻松英语会话---联想1000词(上)

sentences.cn: 布伦达·罗恩斯利穿着华丽的衣服, 带着从银行里借来的钱款, 乘飞机飞过了英吉利海峡.
sentences.en: Brenda Rawnsley, dressed to kill, with money borrowed from the bank, and flew across the Channel.

sentences.cn: 如:他下周将乘飞机去东京.
sentences.en: He will fly to Tokyo next week.

sentences.cn: 受过驾驶大型客机训练的飞行员
sentences.en: a pilot trained to fly large passenger planes

sentences.cn: 他在学习驾驶飞机。
sentences.en: He's learning to fly.

sentences.cn: 两架飞机帕克均成功驾驶过。
sentences.en: Parker had successfully flown both aircraft...

sentences.cn: 他驾驶一架小型飞机飞往古巴。
sentences.en: He flew a small plane to Cuba...

sentences.cn: 那么你终于可以驾驶一架真正的绝地战斗机了.
sentences.en: So eventually you'll be able to fly a real jedi fighter plane.

sentences.cn: 在这款飞行手游里你要驾驶你的心爱飞机, 穿梭在各个不同的飞行赛道,体验驾机的快感.
sentences.en: Driving your aircraft, the shuttle in various track and experience the pleasure of flying.

sentences.cn: 驾驶飞机在高空与敌人盘旋战斗的游戏.
sentences.en: To fly a plane circling at altitude combat with the enemy of the game.

sentences.cn: 还是一个孩子的时候,他就赢得了一次驾驶鹰型战斗机模拟器的机会.
sentences.en: As a child he won a chance to fly a Hawk simulator.

sentences.cn: 他驾驶一架小飞机去古巴了.
sentences.en: He flew a small plane to Cuba.

sentences.cn: 为了积累飞行时间,他曾多次驾驶J3型“幼狐”飞机在当地飞行.
sentences.en: He had flown many J 3 cub trips in the area to build up his flying time.

sentences.cn: 如能严守驾驶规程,飞行是简单的.
sentences.en: Flying is simple if you stick to the rules.

sentences.cn: 它可以非常漂亮地驾驶一架喷气式客机或让飞机着陆.
sentences.en: It flies and lands a Jumbo Jet oh so nicely.

sentences.cn: 你觉得你能用一只手驾驶飞机 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you think you can fly with one hand?

sentences.cn: 他驾驶飞机来到法国.
sentences.en: He flew the aeroplane over to France.

sentences.cn: 这种战略上的有利条件,从一开始就使苏军驾驶员不敢飞得太近.
sentences.en: From the start, this strategic advantage discouraged Soviet pilots from flying too close.

sentences.cn: 英国探险家拜尔和助手驾驶动力滑翔伞飞越了珠穆朗玛峰.
sentences.en: English explorers Bear and his assistant flew the Everest a powered paraglider.

sentences.cn: 驾驶飞机是危险的.
sentences.en: Flying planes is dangerous.

sentences.cn: 他驾驶飞机已有好几年了.
sentences.en: He has flown for years.

sentences.cn: 他驾驶自己的飞机.
sentences.en: He flies his own plane.

sentences.cn: 只有有经验的飞行员才能驾驶大型客机.
sentences.en: Only experienced pilots fly large passenger aircraft.

sentences.cn: 虽然这些人中有25人成为职业军官, 但她们再也没被允许驾驶过任何军用飞机.
sentences.en: Although 25 of them became career officers, they were never again permitted to fly military aircraft.

sentences.cn: 为什么红虾不劫持一架飞机然后驾驶母舰离开.
sentences.en: Why couldn't Christopher just jack a chopper and fly the mothership away?

sentences.cn: 在一个月内,艾米丽雅就可以驾驶一个叫凯内尔的客机了.
sentences.en: Within a month Amelia was flying aKinner Airster.

sentences.cn: 为了能获得驾驶协和飞机的机会,我愿不惜任何代价.
sentences.en: I'd give my ears for a chance to fly on Concorde.

sentences.cn: 洁西只好回到飞机上,然后驾驶飞机盘旋而下,想尽办法要去接著妈妈.
sentences.en: Jessie back in the plane and flew looplooploop.

sentences.cn: 当有中情局飞行员驾驶的飞机在危地马拉市投下了炸弹时.
sentences.en: As planes flown by CIA pilots dropped bombs on Guatemala City.

sentences.cn: 他在战时驾驶轰炸机.
sentences.en: He flew a bomber during the war.

sentences.cn: 为了能得到驾驶协和飞机的机会,我愿不惜个人的任何代价.
sentences.en: I'd give my ears for a chance of fly on concorde.

sentences.cn: 他是第一个驾驶这种飞机的人.
sentences.en: He was the first man ever to fly that type of aircraft.

sentences.cn: 他特地为这个庆典空运鲜花来。
sentences.en: He had flowers specially flown in for the ceremony.

sentences.cn: 周四可能会将妇女和儿童空运出去。
sentences.en: It may be possible to fly the women and children out on Thursday...

sentences.cn: 救济物资正从比萨的一个仓库空运过来。
sentences.en: The relief supplies are being flown from a warehouse in Pisa.

sentences.cn: 红十字会负责向难民空运供给.
sentences.en: Red Cross is in charge of the operation to fly in supplies to the refugees.

sentences.cn: 有些人把车子放到飞机上,空运过海峡.
sentences.en: Some people put their cars on a plane and fly across the Channel.

sentences.cn: 他们将补给品空运到该城市.
sentences.en: They flew the supplies to the city.

sentences.cn: 他准备把他的轿车空运到欧洲去.
sentences.en: He is flying his car to Europe.

sentences.cn: 他们被空运到目的地.
sentences.en: They were flown to the destination.

sentences.cn: 自那以来, 福塞特上尉空运乘客到许多不平常的地方.
sentences.en: Since then, Captain Fawcett has flown passengers to many unusual places.

sentences.cn: 你应该把你的行李空运到你的新家.
sentences.en: You should fly your belongings to your new home.

sentences.cn: 我们决定把我们所有的物品空运到北京.
sentences.en: We decided to fly all of our belongings to Beijing.

sentences.cn: 他们向该城空运医药用品.
sentences.en: They flew medical supplies to the city.

sentences.cn: 这些货物是空运还是海运?
sentences.en: Are the goods to be flown or shipped?

sentences.cn: 所有马匹将从外地空运过来.
sentences.en: All horses will be flown in.

sentences.cn: 他的木乃伊曾经被空运到巴黎进行射线处理.
sentences.en: His mummy was flown to Paris for radiation treatment.

sentences.cn: 在红十字会的保护下,正在空运进医药用品.
sentences.en: Medical supplies are being flown in under the aegis of the Red Cross.

sentences.cn: 莫斯科也将云寻美国从俄领空运送战略物资至阿富汗.
sentences.en: Moscow will also allowe allow the U.S. US to fly military equipment across Russia to Afghanistan.

sentences.cn: 他特地为这一典礼空运来了鲜花.
sentences.en: He had flowers specially flown in forthe ceremony.

sentences.cn: 隆美尔也已经被空运出来, 他已经病得无法继续战斗了.
sentences.en: Rommel had already been flown out, too ill to continue the battle.

sentences.cn: 他们继续给伪军空运武器.
sentences.en: They continued to fly arms to the puppet troops.

sentences.cn: 食物和药品被空运到该区.
sentences.en: Food and medicine were flown to the area.

sentences.cn: 每天有许多吨货物被空运到这个机场.
sentences.en: Tons of freight were flown into this airport every day.

sentences.cn: 美国邮政管理局把受伤的鹰从阿拉斯加空运到鸟类保护区.
sentences.en: And the United States Postal Service has flown injured eagles from Alaska to the sanctuary.

sentences.cn: 我们从加勒比海向北美空运鲜花.
sentences.en: We fly flowers from the Caribbean to North America.

sentences.cn: 补给品正从比萨空运过来.
sentences.en: The supplies are being flown from Pisa.

sentences.cn: 他已将他的汽车空运到法国.
sentences.en: He has flown his car to France.

sentences.cn: 如在空运繁忙季节搭飞机,票价就要贵得多.
sentences.en: The ticket will cost more if one flies during ( the ) high season.

sentences.cn: 救济物资正从比萨的一个仓库空运过来。
sentences.en: The relief supplies are being flown from a warehouse in Pisa.

sentences.cn: 英国随时准备把医护人员空运到该国。
sentences.en: Britain was poised to fly medical staff to the country at short notice.

sentences.cn: 他将原型空运到西雷纳姆，向一批高级军官作演示。
sentences.en: He flew the prototype to West Raynham to demonstrate it to a group of senior officers.

sentences.cn: 确保被测设备具有完整外罩,防止飞出的碎片伤害操作者.
sentences.en: Make sure the device under test is fully enclosed to protect the operator any flying debris.

sentences.cn: 理论上, 你可以使用它改写整个操作系统.
sentences.en: Theoretically, you can use it to rewrite the entire operating system on the fly.

sentences.cn: 复杂气象条件将影响飞行,并要求飞行员做出相应的操作.
sentences.en: The complex atmosphere can affect the flying and requires the pilots to make relative operations.

sentences.cn: 更加关键的是这种无人机能够自动飞行, 无需操作人员手忙脚乱的疲于操控.
sentences.en: Crucially , operators do not need to worry about fiddling with controls ; the drone flies itself.

sentences.cn: 密闭操作, 无粉尘飞扬和喷液飞溅.
sentences.en: With closed operation, neither dust flying nor spray splashing will appear.

sentences.cn: 苍蝇黑压压地成群飞起。
sentences.en: Flies rose in thick black swarms.

sentences.cn: 一只苍蝇嗡嗡地飞着，直撞窗子。
sentences.en: A fly was buzzing against the window.

sentences.cn: 连一只苍蝇都不肯伤害的可爱女孩
sentences.en: ...a lovely girl, who would not have harmed a fly.

sentences.cn: 不久苍蝇又来了, 大象再一次把它赶走.
sentences.en: Then the fly came again, and the elephant waved it away once more.

sentences.cn: 这些苍蝇真使我心烦.
sentences.en: These flies are annoying me.

sentences.cn: 他把手帕遮在脸上挡开苍蝇.
sentences.en: He spread a handkerchief over his face to keep the flies off.

sentences.cn: 她用苍蝇拍打那只苍蝇.
sentences.en: She flipped at the fly with a swatter.

sentences.cn: 出入尘土的苍蝇嗡嗡地叫个不停, 可谁不想一拍子叫它永远沉默?
sentences.en: Not a moment would the fly stop humming; yet everyone means to keep It'silent forever.

sentences.cn: 那头牛轻摆尾巴把苍蝇赶走.
sentences.en: The cow flicked the flies away with its tail.

sentences.cn: 食品店里的苍蝇能引起疾病.
sentences.en: Flies in food shops breed disease.

sentences.cn: 他猛力拍打一只搅得他心烦的苍蝇.
sentences.en: He swatted a fly that was annoying him.

sentences.cn: 生物战让士兵像苍蝇一样纷纷跌落.
sentences.en: The biological warfare caused the soldiers to drop like dead flies.

sentences.cn: 在每个小便池中, 都印着一个小绿头苍蝇.
sentences.en: In each of the urinals, there is a little printed blue fly.

sentences.cn: 有些疾病是由苍蝇传播的.
sentences.en: Some diseases are carried by flies.

sentences.cn: 大苍蝇的嗡嗡声再度扬起.
sentences.en: The buzz of the great flies was loud again.

sentences.cn: 剩下的垃圾堆积在不卫生的堆积,吸引苍蝇并发出臭味.也不是只限于空气和土地污染.
sentences.en: Garbage is left to accumulate in unsanitary heaps that attract flies and give off bad smell.

sentences.cn: 他举出苍蝇作为肮脏昆虫的例子.
sentences.en: He instanced the fly as dirty insect.

sentences.cn: 为什么那些苍蝇粘在你们身上就象是粘在毛毯上一样?
sentences.en: Why do flies stick to you guys like shit to a blanket?

sentences.cn: 等他把蛆培育成成年苍蝇后,他有了决定性的发现.
sentences.en: Once he had reared 11 the maggots to adult flies he made a crucial discovery.

sentences.cn: 我们为苍蝇所扰.
sentences.en: We were pestered with flies.

sentences.cn: 现在, 陪审团开始考虑案情, 大苍蝇又发出嗡嗡之声.
sentences.en: And now, the jury turned to consider, and the great flies swarmed again.

sentences.cn: 他用扇子把苍蝇拍走.
sentences.en: He flapped the flies away with a fan.

sentences.cn: 一大堆苍蝇环绕在坏掉的水果四周.
sentences.en: Flies swarmed around the rotten fruit.

sentences.cn: 他是一个仁慈的老人, 连只苍蝇都不愿伤害.
sentences.en: He was a benevolent old man, he wouldn't hurt a fly.

sentences.cn: 一匙蜜比一桶醋能抓到更多的苍蝇(甜言蜜语比辛辣言词更容易奏效).
sentences.en: You will catch more flies with a spoonful of honey than with a gallon of vinegar.

sentences.cn: 蚂蚁和苍蝇都是昆虫.
sentences.en: Ants and flies are insects.

sentences.cn: 当我炸鸡时,一只苍蝇飞进了厨房.
sentences.en: A fly flies into the kitchen, while I fry the chicken.

sentences.cn: 这头死羊身上被苍蝇叮得满满的.
sentences.en: The dead sheep was covered with swarms of flies.

sentences.cn: 那周围几乎没有任何苍蝇了.
sentences.en: There are scarcely any flies left around there.

sentences.cn: 微风会吹动门帘轻轻飘动.
sentences.en: The breeze would cause the fly to flap.

Sentence.sentence: Teamwork improves with time: America's National Transportation Safety Board found that 73% of the incidents in its civil-aviation database occurred on a crew's first day of flying together.

Sentence.sentence: With such a grand history, kite flying is sure to remain an entertaining and popular sport.

Sentence.sentence: Legend tells of one general who flew musical kites over the enemy’s camp.

Sentence.sentence: He flew the kite in a storm.

Sentence.sentence: By the 15th century, many people flew kites in Europe.

Sentence.sentence: You never see him, but they're with you every time you fly.

Sentence.sentence: So can I fly out early Monday morning?

Sentence.sentence: He will now retrain to fly the bigger Boeing 737s as the old planes are being phased out of service.

Sentence.sentence: Some birds fly in groups for safety, while others fly alone.

Sentence.sentence: Some fly very long distances, including one kind of bird that flies from the remote north of the world, all the way to the distant south.

Sentence.sentence: The airlander will need to have 200 hours' flying time before being allowed to fly by the aviation administration.
